### **Software**

* #### [**cquad**](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/cquad/index.html){target="_blank"}: Conditional Maximum Likelihood for Quadratic Exponential Models for Binary Panel Data. [R](https://www.r-project.org/){target="_blank"} package, 2020.

* #### [**cquadr**](https://ideas.repec.org/c/boc/bocode/s458852.html){target="_blank"}: Stata module to estimate Quadratic Exponential models running the cquad R package. [Stata](https://www.stata.com/){target="_blank"} module, 2020. [User's Guide](https://github.com/fravale/cquadr/blob/master/cquadr-guide.pdf){target="_blank"} and [code](https://github.com/fravale/cquadr){target="_blank"} are also available in my GitHub repository. 

* #### [**spm**](http://ricardo.ecn.wfu.edu/gretl/cgi-bin/current_fnfiles/spm.zip): Spatial Regression Models. [gretl](http://gretl.sourceforge.net/){target="_blank"} function package, 2019. A related [article](http://www.fedoa.unina.it/12338/1/GRETL2019.pdf#page=33){target="_blank"} and [documentation](http://ricardo.ecn.wfu.edu/gretl/cgi-bin/current_fnfiles/unzipped/spm.pdf){target="_blank"} are available.
